verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נָחֲל֥וּ <WH5157> na-cha-Lu inherited בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And these [are the countries] which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִֽחֲל֜וּ <WH5157> ni-cha-Lu distributed for inheritance אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> o-Tam, אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar which Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> vi-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נ֔וּן <WH5126> Nun, of Nun וְרָאשֵׁ֛י <WH7218> ve-ra-Shei and the heads אֲב֥וֹת <WH1> a-Vot of the fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> ham-mat-Tot of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בְּגוֹרַ֖ל <WH1486> be-go-Ral By lot נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam; [was] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, of Moses לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <WH8672> le-tish-'At for the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> ham-mat-Tot tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and [for] the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <WH4294> ham-mat-Teh. tribe

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan had given מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh For Moses נַחֲלַ֨ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat the inheritance שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> she-Nei of two הַמַּטּוֹת֙ <WH4294> ham-mat-tOt tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and an half הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <WH4294> ham-mat-Teh, tribe מֵעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> lai-yar-Den; Jordan וְלַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-Lal-vi-Yim, but unto the Levites לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan he gave נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah none inheritance בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> be-to-Cham. among

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָי֧וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- For the children יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> yo-Sef of Joseph שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei were two מַטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> mat-Tot tribes מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh וְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> ve-'ef-Ra-yim; and Ephraim וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- did not נָתְנוּ֩ <WH5414> na-te-Nu therefore they gave חֵ֨לֶק <WH2506> Che-lek no part לַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim unto the Levites בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, in the land כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo עָרִים֙ <WH5892> 'a-Rim save cities לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <WH3427> la-She-vet, to dwell וּמִ֨גְרְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH4054> u-Mig-re-shei-Hem, [in] with their suburbs לְמִקְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4735> le-mik-nei-Hem for their cattle וּלְקִנְיָנָֽם׃ <WH7075> u-le-kin-ya-Nam. and for their substance

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh As the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken Thus עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su did בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei so the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽיַּחְלְק֖וּ <WH2505> vai-yach-le-Ku and they divided אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the land פ Peh

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <WH5066> vai-yig-ge-Shu came בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- Then the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> bag-gil-Gal, in Gilgal וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, and כָּלֵ֥ב <WH3612> ka-Lev and Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּ֑י <WH7074> hak-ke-niz-Zi; the Kenezite אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יָדַ֡עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta unto him Thou knowest אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּבָר֩ <WH1697> had-da-Var the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> dib-Ber said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God עַ֧ל <WH5921> 'al and אֹדוֹתַ֛י <WH182> o-do-Tai concerning me וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and אֹדוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH182> o-do-Tei-cha and thee בְּקָדֵ֥שׁ be-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <WH6947> bar-Ne-a'. in Kadeshbarnea

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im Forty שָׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi, I בִּ֠שְׁלֹחַ <WH7971> Bish-lo-ach sent מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh [was] I when Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֹתִ֛י <WH853> 'o-Ti מִקָּדֵ֥שׁ mik-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵ֖עַ <WH6947> bar-Ne-a' me from Kadeshbarnea לְרַגֵּ֣ל <WH7270> le-rag-Gel to espy out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; the land וָאָשֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> va-'a-Shev again אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> da-Var, him word כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- as in לְבָבִֽי׃ <WH3824> le-va-Vi. as [it was] in mine heart

וְאַחַי֙ <WH251> ve-'a-Chai Nevertheless my brethren אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עָל֣וּ <WH5927> 'a-Lu that went up עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> 'im-Mi, with הִמְסִ֖יו <WH4529> him-Siv melt אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לֵ֣ב <WH3820> lev with me made the heart הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; of the people וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi I מִלֵּ֔אתִי <WH4390> mil-Le-ti, but I wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei followed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֣ע <WH7650> vai-yish-sha-Va' sware מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom on that day הַהוּא֮ <WH1931> ha-Hu he לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> le-Mor saying אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> Lo, not הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz Surely the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דָּרְכָ֤ה <WH1869> da-re-Chah have trodden רַגְלְךָ֙ <WH7272> rag-le-Cha whereon thy feet בָּ֔הּ Bah, לְךָ֨ le-Cha תִֽהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become לְנַחֲלָ֛ה <WH5159> le-na-cha-Lah shall be thine inheritance וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> u-le-va-Nei-cha and thy children's עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; ever כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki because מִלֵּ֔אתָ <WH4390> mil-Le-ta, because thou hast wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei followed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> hin-Neh behold הֶחֱיָ֨ה <WH2421> he-che-Yah hath kept me alive יְהוָ֣ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh And now behold the LORD אוֹתִי֮ <WH853> o-Ti כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher when דִּבֵּר֒ <WH1696> dib-Ber as he said זֶה֩ <WH2088> zeh these אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im these forty וְחָמֵ֜שׁ <WH2568> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years מֵ֠אָז <WH227> Me-'oz even since דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> had-da-Var this word הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh this אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- when הָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> ha-Lach wandered יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El while [the children of] Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah and now הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, and now lo I [am] this day בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <WH8084> u-she-mo-Nim fourscore שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years

עוֹדֶ֨נִּי <WH5750> o-Den-ni I am still הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom this day חָזָ֗ק <WH2389> cha-Zak, As yet I [am as] strong כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom as [I was] in the day שְׁלֹ֤חַ <WH7971> she-Lo-ach sent אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> o-Ti מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, that Moses כְּכֹ֥חִי <WH3581> ke-Cho-chi me as my strength אָ֖ז <WH227> 'az was then וּכְכֹ֣חִי <WH3581> u-che-Cho-chi [was] then even so [is] my strength עָ֑תָּה <WH6258> 'At-tah; is now לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah now for war וְלָצֵ֥את <WH3318> ve-la-Tzet both to go out וְלָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> ve-la-Vo. and to come in

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now תְּנָה־ <WH5414> te-nah- Now therefore give לִּי֙ li אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָהָ֣ר <WH2022> ha-Har me this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh whereof the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu; he כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אַתָּֽה־ <WH859> 'at-tah- you שָׁמַעְתָּ֩ <WH8085> sha-ma'-Ta for thou heardest בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> vai-Yom in that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that עֲנָקִ֣ים <WH6062> 'a-na-Kim how the Anakims שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> Sham, there וְעָרִים֙ <WH5892> ve-'a-Rim [were] there and [that] the cities גְּדֹל֣וֹת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot [were] great בְּצֻר֔וֹת <WH1219> be-tzu-Rot, [and] fenced אוּלַ֨י <WH194> 'u-Lai if so be יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אוֹתִי֙ <WH854> o-Ti [will be] with וְה֣וֹרַשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH3423> ve-Ho-rash-Tim, me then I shall be able to drive them out כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. as the LORD

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <WH1288> vay-va-re-Che-hu blessed יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a'; And Joshua וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten him and gave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֶבְר֛וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron Hebron לְכָלֵ֥ב <WH3612> le-cha-Lev unto Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh לְנַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> le-na-cha-Lah. for an inheritance

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken after that הָיְתָֽה־ <WH1961> ha-ye-tah- became חֶ֠בְרוֹן <WH2275> Chev-ron Hebron לְכָלֵ֨ב <WH3612> le-cha-Lev of Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֤ה <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּי֙ <WH7074> hak-ke-niz-Zi the Kenezite לְֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> le-na-cha-Lah, therefore became the inheritance עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad until הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after מִלֵּ֔א <WH4390> mil-Le, because that he wholly אַחֲרֵ֕י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei followed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְשֵׁ֨ם <WH8034> ve-Shem And the name חֶבְר֤וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron of Hebron לְפָנִים֙ <WH6440> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֔ע <WH7153> 'ar-Ba', [was] Kirjatharba הָאָדָ֧ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam man הַגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol [which Arba was] a great בָּעֲנָקִ֖ים <WH6062> ba-'a-na-Kim among the Anakims ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz And the land שָׁקְטָ֖ה <WH8252> sha-ke-Tah had rest מִמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> mi-mil-cha-Mah. from war פ Peh
